attributes.action: WILD DEER COLLISIONS; TO MAKE ALL VEHICLE INSURANCE POLICIES COVER WILD DEER COLLISIONS FOR PERSONAL INJURIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WILD DEER COLLISION, TO MAKE ALL VEHICLE INSURANCE POLICIES COVER WILD DEER COLLISION FOR PERSONAL INJURIES VIA THE MOTORISTS INSURANCE BUREAU.  THIS WILL BE THE SAME AS THE EXISITING COVER FOR THE UNINSURED/UNTRACED DRIVER PROBLEM.  IT WILL ENSURE THAT APPROXIMATELY 250 PEOPLE PER YEAR WHO ARE INJURED ON BRITAINS BY THESE COLLISIONS ARE COVERED FOR THIS RISK.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
